files.description: Defines a single OUTPUT_DIR helper (defaulting to ./outputs with optional environment-variable override) plus small path utilities used by all artifact/log writers.
Centralizes all artifact/log writing functions and refactors them to build destinations via the shared OUTPUT_DIR helper instead of hardcoded /outputs paths.
Updates the pipeline entrypoint to route all produced logs/artifacts through the shared OUTPUT_DIR helper and avoid emitting absolute /outputs references.
Pytest that runs key writer/pipeline code paths and asserts no absolute '/outputs' paths appear in generated artifacts or captured logs.
